name: friskily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is full of activity or shows that you like to play: Outside, the April breeze travelled friskily through the garden. The lambs ran around friskily. See
frisky
More examplesFewer examplesHe tugged almost friskily at her arm.The kittens were friskily full of life and movement. There's something kind of friskily magical about the exuberance they bring to the dance.
